select d1.title as title, d1.goal_amt as goalAmt, d1.rec_stat as state, sum(d2.don_amt) as donaitonAmt, count(distinct (d2.mem_id)) as donors, d1.don_id as donId from donation d1 left join don_ledger d2 on d1.don_id=d2.don_id group by d1.don_id,d1.title, d1.goal_amt, d1.rec_stat
